SEARCH
Module main.Main
Package survey

Class SurveyManager

java.lang.Object
survey.SurveyManager
public class SurveyManager extends Object
Main class for survey management for each interaction connected with surveys.

  • Method Details

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe(SurveyObserver subscriber)
      Subscribes a user for surveys update.
      Parameters:
      subscriber - The subscriber to be added.

    • unsubscribe

      public void unsubscribe(SurveyObserver subscriber)
      Unsubscribes a user from surveys update.
      Parameters:
      subscriber - The subscriber to be removed. This method is not used now due to non-existence of user deletion.

    • getEmployeeSurveys

      public ArrayList<Survey> getEmployeeSurveys(Employee user)
      Retrieves surveys available for a specific employee to vote.
      Parameters:
      user - The employee for whom to retrieve surveys.
      Returns:
      The surveys available for the employee to vote.

    • getPersonalSurveys

      public ArrayList<Survey> getPersonalSurveys(Employee user)
      Retrieves surveys where a specific employee is the owner.
      Parameters:
      user - The employee for whom to retrieve personal surveys.
      Returns:
      The surveys where the employee is the owner.

    • createNewSurvey

      public void createNewSurvey(String name, String description, ArrayList<String> teams, ArrayList<String> options, boolean isMultipleChoice)
      Creates a new survey with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the survey.
      description - The description of survey
      teams - The teams' names eligible to participate in the survey.
      options - The options available in the survey.
      isMultipleChoice - Indicates if the survey is multiple choice or single choice.

    • deleteSurvey

      public void deleteSurvey(Survey survey)
      Deletes a survey.
      Parameters:
      survey - The survey to be deleted.

    • loadSurvey

      public void loadSurvey(String id)
      Loads a survey with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the survey to be loaded.

    • voteInSurvey

      public void voteInSurvey(ArrayList<String> ids)
      Processes the vote in the current survey.
      Parameters:
      ids - The IDs of the options selected by the user.
